com.google.android.exoplayer2.offline

Class SegmentDownloader<M,K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.offline.SegmentDownloader<M,K>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - The type of the manifest object.
    K - The type of the representation key object.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Downloader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DashDownloader, HlsDownloader, SsDownloader 

    public abstract class SegmentDownloader<M,K>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Downloader
    Base class for multi segment stream downloaders.

    All of the methods are blocking. Also they are not thread safe, except getTotalSegments(), getDownloadedSegments() and getDownloadedBytes().

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  SegmentDownloader.Segment
      Smallest unit of content to be downloaded.

      • selectRepresentations

        public final void selectRepresentations(K[] keys)
        Selects multiple representations pointed to by the keys for downloading, checking status. Any previous selection is cleared. If keys are null or empty, all representations are downloaded.

      • init

        public final void init()
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Initializes the total segments, downloaded segments and downloaded bytes counters for the selected representations.
        Specified by:
        init in interface Downloader
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when there is an io error while reading from cache.
        DownloadException - Thrown if the media cannot be downloaded.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the thread has been interrupted.

        getTotalSegments(), getDownloadedSegments(), getDownloadedBytes()

      • getSegments

        protected abstract java.util.List<SegmentDownloader.Segment> getSegments(DataSource dataSource,
                                                                         M manifest,
                                                                         K[] keys,
                                                                         boolean allowIncompleteIndex)
                                                                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                                         java.io.IOException
        Returns a list of SegmentDownloader.Segments for given keys.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - The DataSource through which to load any required data.
        manifest - The manifest containing the segments.
        keys - The selected representation keys.
        allowIncompleteIndex - Whether to continue in the case that a load error prevents all segments from being listed. If true then a partial segment list will be returned. If false an IOException will be thrown.
        Returns:
        A list of SegmentDownloader.Segments for given keys.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thrown if the thread was interrupted.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if allowPartialIndex is false and a load error occurs, or if the media is not in a form that allows for its segments to be listed.

                                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                                             java.lang.InterruptedException
        Initializes totalSegments, downloadedSegments and downloadedBytes for selected representations. If not offline then downloads missing metadata.
        Returns:
        A list of not fully downloaded segments.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
